alert.note: Alert for Inland Liberty; Long (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Charleston (the Southern end of South Carolina and Eastern Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 09 at 4:44PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF LIBERTY AND LONG COUNTIES... At 443 PM EDT, National Weather Service doppler radar indicated a strong thunderstorm over Walthourville, or near Hinesville, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...up to penny sized hail. SOURCE...Radar Indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to plants, trees and crops is possible. Damage to windshields is unlikely. Some locations in the path of this storm include... Hinesville, Ludowici, Fort Stewart, McIntosh, Walthourville, Riceboro, Flemington and Allenhurst. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...<45 MPH
info.instruction: Report damage directly to the Charleston National Weather Service at 888-383-2024 when it is safe to do so. You can also email your report to nws.charlestonsc@noaa.gov.
